DOC.brief_summary: The purpose investigation evaluate method spinal cord injure individual improve reflex urination . Anal dilation investigate reduce high urethral resistance vibrator patient 's bottom test induce sustain bladder contraction well bladder empty .
DOC.brief_title: Two Devices Reflex Voiding Following Spinal Cord Injury
DOC.detailed_description: Catheters often used individual empty bladder follow spinal cord injury . Reflex void one bladder empty method , relies spontaneous bladder contraction void . These contraction occur normal bladder filling induce suprapubic tap hair pull . Poor void response reflex void occur unwanted contraction urethra bladder contraction and/or unsustained bladder contraction result high residual urine . The focus investigation method reduce high urethral resistance induce sustain bladder contraction . Obj.1 . Measure pelvic floor contractile activity include pelvic floor relaxation response ( urethral anal pressure , EMG bulbocavernosus reflex ) dilation anus digit balloon 60 sec diameter 2 , 3.5 5 cm . Obj . 2 . Measure urodynamic parameter ( urethral anal pressure , EMG , urine flow rate bladder pressure ) compare three somatic method induce bladder contraction , vibration ( 3 mm conduct 100 stroke per second ) suprapubic perineum ( scrotum anus ) location tapping/suprapubic hair pull . Conduct procedure use 80 % cystometric capacity define responder three intervention increase 10 cm H20 pressure great . For nonresponders go objective 4 . Obj . 3 . For responder Ob . 2 , evaluate effect perineum vibration conduct comparison ( 1 ) anal dilation dilation ; ( 2 ) A vibration stroke length 1.5 mm 3 mm ; ( 3 ) A bladder volume 50 % cystometric capacity 80 % . Obj . 4 . Compare urodynamic response spontaneous bladder contraction induce bladder filling ( cystometry ) without anal dilation . Obj . 5 . Conduct human factor assessment . Determine problem use current perineum vibration anal dilation device . Evaluate curve tip insertion device anal dilator would facilitate insertion use plastic bag would improve hygiene . Discuss feature important user-friendly home-use device . Design & Methods : All objective conduct single , urodynamic , test protocol . Fifteen male SCI patient upper-motor-neuron injury enrol . Urodynamic response primary measure . These include urethral anal sphincter pressure anal surface EMG , bladder contraction include peak pressure duration pressure , void response include peak void rate duration void . These measure evaluate anal dilation perineum vibration method alone combination . Anal dilation protocol include random duplicated testing . Vibration method do limit risk autonomic dysreflexia . Analysis variance follow Student-Neuman-Keuls post hoc test conduct assess significant difference . Importance Findings : Results study provide evidence anal dilation reduce DSD perineum vibration improve bladder contraction . Thus , study could provide important evidence improve method RV individual SCI . During pilot study , subject counsel conduct RV daily regular bladder management program .
DOC.criteria: Male Veterans use Hines VA Hospital SCI Service upper motor neuron injury Can voluntarily control urination Surgically remove external urethral sphincter men replace bladder Any implant device low urinary tract Female Urinary tract infection prior 3 month untreated urinary tract infection , bladder pathology tumor stone History autonomic dysreflexia Anal inflammation pathology Use Indwelling ( Foley ) catheter primary method bladder management ; note patient include occasionally use Foley catheter ; example , travel Not 18 70 year old good health Less 3months injury return bladder reflex Lower motor neuron spinal cord injury Not competent understand study consent willing participate study .
